sqlMap.select: SELECT C.CHAT_DETAIL_CONTENT, C.CHAT_DETAIL_DATE, M.MEMBER_NAME, C.CHAT_ROOM_IDX, C.CHAT_DETAIL_IDX, C.MEMBER_IDX FROM CHAT_DETAIL C, MEMBER M WHERE CHAT_ROOM_IDX = #chat_room_idx# AND C.MEMBER_IDX = M.MEMBER_IDX ORDER BY CHAT_DETAIL_DATE
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO chat_detail (chat_detail_idx, chat_room_idx, member_idx, chat_detail_content, chat_detail_date) VALUES (CHAT_DETAIL_IDX_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #chat_room_idx#, #member_idx#, #chat_detail_content#, SYSDATE)
sqlMap.select: select chat_room_idx from chat_room where member_idx = #member_idx#
select member_name from chat_room cr, member m where m.member_idx = cr.member_idx and cr.chat_room_idx = #chat_room_idx# order by member_name
select * from (select chat_detail_content from chat_detail where chat_room_idx = #chat_room_idx# order by chat_detail_date desc) where rownum <=1

SELECT DISTINCT CR.CHAT_ROOM_IDX FROM MEMBER M, CHAT_ROOM CR, (SELECT CR.CHAT_ROOM_IDX FROM MEMBER M, CHAT_ROOM CR WHERE M.MEMBER_IDX = CR.MEMBER_IDX AND CR.MEMBER_IDX = #member_idx#) X WHERE M.MEMBER_IDX = CR.MEMBER_IDX AND CR.CHAT_ROOM_IDX = X.CHAT_ROOM_IDX AND M.MEMBER_NAME LIKE '%'||#member_name#||'%'
